reasoning: Spondylarthritis group (ankylosing spondylitis, reactive arthritis, psoriatic arthritis with spondylitis, IBD-associated arthritis) reported as prevalence ~1.0-1.5% globally (1,000-15,000 per 100k), with 1.2% (~12 per 100k) as reasonable midpoint. Prevalence preferred over incidence for this chronic condition group. Significant geographic variation due to HLA-B27 distribution.
source: van der Linden S et al. (2016). Ankylosing spondylitis and axial spondyloarthritis: clinical features and treatment. Nat Rev Dis Primers. 2:16008
